articles.title: Cyclist Julien Bernard fined for kissing wife during Tour de France - BBC.com
articles.description: Cycling's governing body says the fine is for "unseemly or inappropriate behaviour".
articles.content:
French cyclist Julien Bernard has given a light-hearted apology after being fined for kissing his wife during a Tour de France time trial. 
The Lidl-Trek rider was made to pay 200 Swiss francs ($223… [+1676 chars]
